### Tender Description
Canada has a requirement for the construction of a trestle structure to access the seawater pumphouse at the St. Andrews Biological Station (SABS) Wharf, in St. Andrews, Charlotte County, New Brunswick. The work includes providing all plant, labour, equipment, and materials for the construction of the bridge structure, within twenty (20) weeks from the issuance of the award. Only bids submitted before 14:00 EST on the closing date will be considered. Responsive Bids are Welcome.
